title: internships
content: I wanna try do an internship or some sort of research in the summer (4th sem cse) but idk where to apply. any tips homies?

comments.body:
Dad's friends

(no one gives internships to 4th sem kids, what skills do you have at this time that you can use?)
I heard CIE is doing a machine learning workshop for a month and at the end of it you get preference for their summer internship program for 2024
Research internships u ask at any of the labs in college. They should give it to you just be prepared to work hard
